pr_title: Provide Plugin System to add Items to the Navigation

timeline.bodyText: This probably will need to wrap around the ThemeProvider stuff so that in the future we can reference the CustomizationProvider inside of src/theme/GraylogThemeProvider.jsx and get any modified color values.
timeline.author: kyleknighted

replies.bodyText:
Should we do it now or later?
What do you suggest exactly should I do?
replies.author: kmerz

replies.bodyText: I do have some suggestions, but may require some back-and-forth to make sure all our needs are accounted for. Let's plan a time to pair up for 30 minutes and discuss this!
replies.author: kyleknighted

timeline.bodyText: Not sure if these changes are relevant to the Customization Plugin system?
timeline.author: kyleknighted

replies.bodyText: These changes are needed in the enterprise PR, I could do them in an extra PR, but I thought it does not harm here.
replies.author: kmerz

timeline.bodyText: Not sure if these changes are relevant to the Customization Plugin system?
timeline.author: kyleknighted

replies.bodyText: Not for the plugin system but for the header badge which is part of the customization page.
replies.author: kmerz

timeline.bodyText: Should the {} be something more specific?
timeline.author: kyleknighted

replies.bodyText:
Since the customization will be pluggable I do not know what will be in that store state.
So I could add something like:
[string]: mixed
but I do not think we will gain much with that.
replies.author: kmerz

replies.bodyText:
I agree that we will not gain much, but perhaps we should still use [string]: mixed for consistency as it seems we use that more often?
I will defer to your judgement here though as my Flow experience is minimal.
replies.author: kyleknighted

timeline.bodyText: I think this should indicate that it's not a generic header badge, but the DevelopmentHeaderBadge or something similar.
timeline.author: dennisoelkers

timeline.message: Rename HeaderBadge to fit its purpose

Allow Plugins to add Header Badge to Navigation

The enterprise plugin will add a new HeaderBadge
for custumiztion and this needs to be add to the navigation.
Rename HeaderBadge to fit its purpose

Revert "Fix linter warnings"

This reverts commit eebce89f803bc1b33bc0d7c3859158d2413210b4.

Revert "Fix linter warnings"
